snippet: Denise L. Eger is scheduled to be installed on Monday as the president of the Central Conference of American Rabbis.
abstract: Denise L Eger will be installed as first openly gay president of Central Conference of American Rabbis, which is the rabbinical arm of Reform Judaism.
lead_paragraph: Denise L. Eger is scheduled to be installed on Monday as the president of the Central Conference of American Rabbis.

headline.main: Lesbian Rabbi Is to Become President of Reform Group
headline.print_headline: Lesbian Rabbi Is to Become President of Reform Group

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
